sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import logo from "../utils/logo_menu.png"; import menu from "../utils/menu.png"; import "../style/styles.css"; import { NavLink } from "react-router-dom"; import { useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; export default function NavBar2() { const location = useLocation(); function handleClick(e) { e.preventDefault(); if (location.pathname !== "/") { document.querySelector(".all-content").classList.toggle("all-toggle"); document.querySelector(".navbar").classList.toggle("active-nav"); } else { document.querySelector(".navbar").classList.toggle("active-nav"); } } return ( <>
handleClick(e)} className="btn-nav" alt="logo" src={menu} width="30px" height="30px" />
  • Admin. Datos
    • Alumnos
    • handleClick(e)}> Docentes
    • Materias
  • Calificaciones

    • Mesas de Examen
    • Boletines
  • Inasistencias

    • Reincorporaciones
); }
